metadata.name: Rivers of Blood
metadata.description:
This is 1 NFT in a collection of 7 compositions issued in a single unique edition.

Composition: 4K

The inspiration for the creation came while listening to the composition "Overgrown". The girl is gentle, pure and innocent, like a morning dewdrop. Nevertheless, she is a warrior by nature, and she is trying to communicate us her emotions.

The katana in her hands is is called "Rivers of Blood" and it symbolizes courage, representing the victory over modesty in this world.
